backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing a dental clinic appointment system with opening hours management, appointment booking, user profiles, and role-based access control (admin/user permissions). The clinic is permanently open with status functions always returning true.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that removes the obsolete clinicStatus field from the actor state, preserving opening hours, appointments, user profiles, and appointment ID counter during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the frontend update for displaying clinic open status and enabling appointment booking functionality across five frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing the React application structure with TanStack Router, appointment booking, admin dashboard, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Annaya Dental Care application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, booking, services, service details, and admin pages, wrapped with QueryClient and Toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying a shield alert icon and message for unauthorized admin page access with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/AdminLoginForm.t: Admin login form component with username/password fields, error handling, loading states, and Internet Identity connection feedback that calls useAdminAuth hook for authentication.
A comprehensive appointment booking form component with calendar selection, service type mapping, network status handling, and success/error states. Includes lazy-loaded calendar, form validation with react-hook-form, and integration with backend appointment booking mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays clinic contact information including location, phone, email, working hours, and a WhatsApp button. Uses scroll animations and card layout for visual presentation.
frontend/src/components/DoctorsSection.t: Showcases three dental professionals with avatars, names, and specializations in a responsive grid layout. Implements scroll-triggered animations for each doctor card.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with clinic branding, contact details, quick links, and attribution to caffeine.ai. Displays current year and organized in a three-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with responsive mobile menu, route and scroll-based navigation, active section tracking, and phone number display. Handles both page routes and smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Main landing hero section with dual image layout, clinic status badge, and dynamic CTAs that change based on clinic open/closed status. Features background images with overlay gradients.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component wrapping Header, main content outlet, and Footer with a subtle admin access button in the bottom-right corner.
frontend/src/components/NetworkStatusInd: Displays real-time network connectivity status with icons for online, offline, and checking states using the useNetworkStatus hook.
Displays a grid of dental service cards (checkup, root canal, implants, whitening, braces, pediatric) with icons, images, descriptions, and links to service detail pages and booking. Uses scroll animations and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Renders patient testimonials in an auto-playing carousel with star ratings, a before/after treatment showcase image, and Google rating display. Pauses autoplay on hover.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Displays four feature cards (expert doctors, modern technology, emergency care, affordable pricing) and a photo gallery of clinic facilities with scroll animations and hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Manages admin authentication state with sessionStorage persistence, validates hardcoded credentials (6352174912/63521), and integrates with Internet Identity for backend authorization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using @dfinity/auth-client, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkStatus.ts: Monitors network connectivity status using browser online/offline events and provides manual connectivity checking via HEAD request to favicon with 3-second timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating appointment data, user profiles, clinic status, and opening hours using the backend actor. Includes hooks for getting all appointments, searching by service, managing user profiles, and admin operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom React hook that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger animations when elements scroll into view. Supports configurable threshold, trigger-once behavior, and respects user's reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and keyframe animations for page transitions, form entrances, and UI element effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing appointments and clinic hours, featuring authentication checks, appointment filtering/sorting, and opening hours editing functionality. Displays admin login form when not authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Appointment booking page that displays the AppointmentForm component with a back button and checks clinic open status. Includes animated page transitions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that composes multiple sections (Hero, Services, WhyChooseUs, Doctors, Testimonials, Contact) and passes clinic open status to the hero section.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Detailed service information page that displays comprehensive descriptions, procedures, benefits, and duration for individual dental services based on URL parameters. Includes static service data with icons and color schemes.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services overview page displaying a grid of dental service cards with icons, descriptions, durations, and links to detailed service pages. Uses scroll animations for card entrance effects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a component-based UI system.
project_state.json: Project state file for a dental clinic appointment system tracking feature requests to enable clinic open/closed status management and permanent open status for accepting appointments.
